page.title: 09EDUCATION SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: The Woodlands School,Coventry,the 6th form registration is at 8.30a.m, pupils then go to assembly in houserooms & occasionally take assembly.In the morning the 6th formers study one subject with one break mid_morning.If they have no lesson 6th formers have private study when they can do their homework .After a 1/2 hour dinner break, they have lessons or private study until 3.30pm when they return home. In the 1st year lessons start at 8.45 am & finish at 3.30 pm ,each lesson is 70 mins.long.Monday is all right because we have drama, this is a good laugh,then History,which is interesting.Maths is boring because we have already done the work in Junior School.Friday is the best day as it is the last day before the weekend.
